name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FB Feed Cleaner — Hides unwanted posts & ads

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides unwanted posts, suggested posts and advertisements from Facebook News Feed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of sifting through unwanted posts, ads, and endless suggestions in your Facebook feed? With FB Feed Cleaner, you can take control of your experience and cut through the noise. This simple yet powerful extension hides the clutter—no more distracting ads, random suggestions, or irrelevant posts from pages you don’t care about.

Stay focused on what truly matters: the people you care about. Whether it's updates from your friends or posts from pages you actually follow, FB Feed Cleaner ensures that you see only the content you want, helping you stay more productive and connected.

Enjoy a cleaner, more streamlined Facebook experience, with less distraction and more meaningful content. Boost your focus and take back control of your feed with FB Feed Cleaner today!
